::: {.cell hash='2018-07_cache/pdf/unnamed-chunk-2_8f3cd3c616c76b9c9c86698aea90ef6f'}

```{.r .cell-code}
dt <- fread("test.txt", header = FALSE) |>
  select(V2, V8) |>
  rename("predecessor" = V2, "task" = V8)
t <- dt$task
p <- dt$predecessor
head(dt)
```

```
2:           C    F
3:           A    B
4:           A    D
5:           B    E
6:           D    E
```

## Part 1



::: {.cell hash='2018-07_cache/pdf/unnamed-chunk-3_f8da62ccf547a186b4596e7db61987cb'}

```{.r .cell-code}
DiagrammeR::mermaid(c("graph LR;",
                      apply(dt[rowSums(is.na(dt)) == 0, ], 1, function(x) {
                        paste0(x["predecessor"], " --> ", x["task"], ";")
                      })))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](2018-07_files/figure-pdf/unnamed-chunk-3-1.pdf){fig-pos='H'}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='2018-07_cache/pdf/unnamed-chunk-4_9cd676a113b09719d30a600a10ad1429'}

```{.r .cell-code}
start <- unique(p[!(p %in% t)])
end <- unique(t[!(t %in% p)])
vec <- c()
ls <- list()

getParent <- function(x) {
  x <- dt$predecessor[dt$task %in% x]
  if(length(x) > 0) {
    x <- rev(sort(unique(x)))
    ls <<- append(ls, paste(rev(x), collapse = ""))
    vec <<- c(vec, x)
    return(getParent(x))
  } else { return(x) }
}

getParent(end)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
character(0)
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
lapply(ls, function(x) {
  unique(str_split(x, ""))
}) |>
  rev() |>
  unlist() |>
  unique() -> vec
paste(c(vec, end), collapse = "")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "CABDFE"
```
:::
